title: Geometric Radiance: Rose Gold Finish Layered Necklace with Jhumka Set
materials: High-Quality Alloy with Rose Gold Finish
Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Stones. Meticulously crafted with a durable Hyderabadi polish ensuring longevity and enhanced brilliance.
features: This unique set features a three-layered necklace with geometric patterns connected by circular designs. The layers are interspersed with varying circle patterns. The earrings, a modern take on the classic Jhumka, echo the geometric theme with circular and rectangular elements. The geometric patterns are embellished with small CZ Stones to give a high-end look. There is no Nakshi Work
colors: Predominantly Rose Gold with clear Cubic Zirconia highlights. The soft rose gold provides a warm
perfectly complementing the sparkling CZ stones.
occasions: and festive occasions. Also perfect for a chic Indo-Western look at parties and events. For those occasions where traditional ethnic looks are required but with a modern twist.
description: A unique fusion of modern geometric design with the essence of traditional Indian jewelry. Crafted with durable, high-quality materials ensuring lasting beauty. The rose gold finish and sparkling CZ stones offer a luxurious look at an accessible price point. The design is eye-catching and perfect for a modern and contemporary women
